amendment.description: To use surveillance technology to protect the borders of the United States.

action.text: Amendment SA 3220 proposed by Senator Nelson FL to Amendment SA 3192. (consideration: CR S2852-2853; text: CR S2852) To use surveillance technology to protect the borders of the United States.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3220 proposed by Senator Nelson FL to Amendment SA 3192.
